text: Þis gewrit sendeþ se arcebisceop his hlaforde æþelrede cynge.
Hit gelamp þæt Westwealas onhofon hi ongean Ecgbriht cyng.
Þa ferde se cyng þyder & gewylde hi & geteoþude þone erd & ateh swa him þuhte.
Sealde þa inn to Scireburnan þreo land, Polltun, Cællwic, Landwiþan.
& þæt swa þa stod wintra þrage oþ hæþene herias þysne eard ofor eodun & gesætun.
Þa wearþ oþer tid æfter þan þæt lariowas afeollun & ut gewitun of Anglalande for þære geleafleste þe him þa onsæge gewearþ.
& stod eall Westsexena riceVIIgear buton bisceope.
Þa sende Formosus se Papa of Rome byrig & gemyngude Eadweard cyng & Plegmund arcebisceop þæt hi þæt gebetun.

& hi swa dydun, mid geþeahte þæs Papan & eall Angelcynnes witena gesettunVbisceopas þæs ær wærun twegen, anne æt <wintancestre>, þæt wæs Fryþestan, oþerne to Hremnes byrig, þæt wæs æþelstan, þriddun to Scireburnan þæt wæs Wærstan, feorþan to Wyllun, þæt wæs æþelm, fiftan to Cridian tune, þæt wæs Eadulf.
& him mon betæhte þa þreo land on Wealan to innstinge inn to Defenun forþam þe hi ær þam unhyrsume wærun buton Westsexena ege.
& Eadulf bisceop þyssa landa breac his lifes tida, æþelgar bisceop æfter him eall swa.
Þa gelamp hit þæt æþestan cing sealde Cunune bisceoprice ealswa Tamur scæt.
Þa gelamp þæt Eadræd cyng het hadian Daniel & betæhte þa land swa him witan ræddun inn to Sanct<../images/etail.gif>Germane to þam bisceopstole.

Æfter þam þa Eadgar cyng me het þæt ic Wulfsige hadude þa cwæþ he & ealle ure bisceopas þæt hi nystun hwa rihtlucur þa land ahte þonne þære scire bisceop þa he innhold wæs & Godes geleafan on riht bodude & his hlaford lufude.
Gyf þonne þes bisceop nu swa deþ ic nat hwy he ne sy þara landa wyrþe gyf him heora God ann & ure hlaford, forþan us ne þing þæt hi ænig man rihtlicor age þonne he.
& gif hi ænig man him to teo hæbbe hi butan Godes bletsunge & ure.
